sections.description: Advanced autonomous AI agent powered by Claude with learning capabilities, workflows, and intelligent automation.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to /wp-content/plugins/claude-agent/
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu
3. Configure your Anthropic API key in Settings
